settings.custom_liquid:
<!-- Ernährungsberatung & Hausmannskost („Daniel's Küche") - Pagina Dedicata -->
<div class="pflegeteufel-page-wrapper">
<style>
    /* Isolamento completo per evitare conflitti */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper {
        all: initial;
        display: block;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        isolation: isolate;
        contain: layout style;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper *,
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper *::before,
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper *::after {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    /* Container principale */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .service-page {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 40px 20px;
        background: white;
        min-height: auto;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        width: 100%;
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    /* Hero Section */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-section {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C12624 0%, #A01F1D 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 60px 40px;
        border-radius: 16px;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
        text-align: center;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
        animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
        animation-delay: 0.2s;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-section::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #A01F1D, #8B1A1A);
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-icon {
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        width: 80px;
        height: 80px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        margin: 0 auto 20px;
        font-size: 40px;
        border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-title {
        font-size: 2.4rem;
        font-weight: 900;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        line-height: 1.1;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.5px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-subtitle {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        line-height: 1.3;
        opacity: 0.95;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-description {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        opacity: 0.9;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* Content Section */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .content-section {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr;
        gap: 40px;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
        animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
        animation-delay: 0.6s;
    }

    /* Main Content */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .main-content {
        background: white;
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 40px;
        box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        border: 1px solid rgba(225, 225, 225, 0.5);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .section-title {
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        font-weight: 900;
        color: #2c3e50;
        margin-bottom: 25px;
        line-height: 1.2;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.3px;
        border-bottom: 3px solid #C12624;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .content-text {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        line-height: 1.7;
        color: #555;
        margin-bottom: 30px;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* Nutrition Services Grid */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-services {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        gap: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 30px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #e9ecef 100%);
        padding: 25px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        border-left: 5px solid #C12624;
        transition: all 0.4s ease;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(193, 38, 36, 0.15);
        border-left-width: 8px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 60px;
        height: 60px;
        background: rgba(193, 38, 36, 0.1);
        border-radius: 50%;
        transform: translate(20px, -20px);
        transition: all 0.4s ease;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card:hover::before {
        transform: translate(15px, -15px) scale(1.2);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-icon {
        font-size: 2.2rem;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        display: block;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-title {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #2c3e50;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        line-height: 1.3;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-description {
        font-size: 0.95rem;
        line-height: 1.5;
        color: #666;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* GALLERY SEZIONE FOTO SOTTO LE CARD */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .food-gallery {
        margin: 40px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
        animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
        animation-delay: 0.8s;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-title {
        font-size: 1.6rem;
        font-weight: 900;
        color: #2c3e50;
        margin-bottom: 25px;
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 1.2;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.3px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
        gap: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 30px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item {
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        border-radius: 12px;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        transition: all 0.5s ease;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        z-index: 100;
        box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-image {
        width: 100%;
        height: 250px;
        object-fit: cover;
        transition: all 0.5s ease;
    }

    /* DESKTOP: IMMAGINI SEMPRE ESPANSE */
    @media (min-width: 1025px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-image {
            height: 400px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item {
            cursor: default;
        }
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-image {
        height: 400px;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item:hover .gallery-image {
        transform: scale(1.02);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-image {
        transform: scale(1);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: linear-gradient(transparent, rgba(0,0,0,0.7));
        color: white;
        padding: 20px;
        transform: translateY(100%);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item:hover .gallery-overlay {
        transform: translateY(0);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-overlay {
        display: none;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-caption {
        font-size: 1rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 5px;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-description {
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        opacity: 0.9;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        line-height: 1.4;
    }

    /* RESPONSIVE GALLERY */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-image {
            height: 500px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .pflegeteuffel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-image {
            height: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item.expanded .gallery-image {
            height: 450px;
        }
    }

    /* Partner Section */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-section {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745 0%, #20c997 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 30px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        margin: 30px 0;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-section::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #20c997, #17a2b8);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-icon {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        display: block;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-title {
        font-size: 1.3rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.2px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-text {
        font-size: 1rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        opacity: 0.95;
    }

    /* Daniel's Kitchen Brand Section */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-section {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fd7e14 0%, #dc3545 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 30px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        margin: 30px 0;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-section::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #dc3545, #c82333);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-logo {
        font-size: 3rem;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        display: block;
        animation: cookingPulse 2s infinite;
    }

    @keyframes cookingPulse {
        0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
        50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-name {
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        font-weight: 900;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.2px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-tagline {
        font-size: 1rem;
        opacity: 0.95;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        line-height: 1.5;
    }

    /* Sidebar */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .sidebar {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 25px;
    }

    /* Philosophy Box */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-box {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6f42c1 0%, #5a2d91 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 30px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        text-align: center;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-box::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #5a2d91, #461e6b);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-icon {
        font-size: 3rem;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        display: block;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-title {
        font-size: 1.3rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.2px;
        line-height: 1.2;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-text {
        font-size: 1rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
        opacity: 0.95;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* Delivery Box */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-box {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #17a2b8 0%, #138496 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 25px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-box::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #138496, #0c6674);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-icon {
        font-size: 2.2rem;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        display: block;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-title {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.2px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-text {
        font-size: 0.95rem;
        line-height: 1.5;
        opacity: 0.95;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* Info Box */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #e9ecef 100%);
        padding: 25px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid #e9ecef;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 4px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffc107, #fd7e14);
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box-icon {
        font-size: 2rem;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        display: block;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box-title {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        color: #2c3e50;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.2px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box-text {
        font-size: 0.95rem;
        line-height: 1.5;
        color: #555;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* CTA Section */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-section {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C12624 0%, #A01F1D 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 40px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 40px;
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
        animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
        animation-delay: 1s;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-title {
        font-size: 1.6rem;
        font-weight: 900;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        line-height: 1.2;
        font-family: 'Arial Black', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: -0.3px;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-text {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        line-height: 1.5;
        margin-bottom: 25px;
        opacity: 0.95;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    }

    /* Bottone CTA isolato */
    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-button {
        all: unset !important;
        display: inline-block !important;
        background: white !important;
        color: #C12624 !important;
        padding: 18px 35px !important;
        font-size: 1.1rem !important;
        font-weight: bold !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
        border-radius: 8px !important;
        transition: all 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275) !important;
        position: relative !important;
        overflow: hidden !important;
        text-transform: uppercase !important;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px !important;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) !important;
        cursor: pointer !important;
        font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif !important;
        text-align: center !important;
        border: none !important;
        outline: none !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }

    .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-button:hover {
        transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.05) !important;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
        background: #f8f9fa !important;
        color: #A01F1D !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }

    /* Animazioni */
    @keyframes fadeInUp {
        from {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(30px);
        }
        to {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
    }

    /* Responsive */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .content-section {
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 30px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-services {
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        }

        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-grid {
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-image {
            height: 200px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-section {
            padding: 40px 20px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-title {
            font-size: 2rem;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .service-page {
            padding: 20px 10px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 100%;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-section {
            padding: 30px 15px;
            margin: 0 0 30px 0;
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1.2;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-description {
            font-size: 1rem;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .main-content {
            padding: 20px 15px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .section-title {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
        }

        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-title {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
        }

        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-image {
            height: 180px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .content-text {
            font-size: 1rem;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card {
            padding: 20px 15px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-section {
            padding: 25px 15px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-section {
            padding: 25px 15px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-box {
            padding: 25px 15px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-box {
            padding: 20px 15px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box {
            padding: 20px 15px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-section {
            padding: 30px 15px;
            margin: 30px 0 0 0;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-title {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-text {
            font-size: 1rem;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .service-page {
            padding: 15px 5px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-section {
            padding: 25px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .hero-title {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .main-content {
            padding: 15px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .nutrition-card {
            padding: 15px 10px;
        }

        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-image {
            height: 150px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .partner-section {
            padding: 20px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .brand-section {
            padding: 20px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .philosophy-box {
            padding: 20px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .delivery-box {
            padding: 15px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .info-box {
            padding: 15px 10px;
        }
        
        .pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .cta-section {
            padding: 25px 10px;
        }
    }
</style>

<div class="service-page">
    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <div class="hero-section">
        <div class="hero-icon">🍽️</div>
        <h1 class="hero-title">Daniel's Küche</h1>
        <h2 class="hero-subtitle">Gesunde Ernährung & traditionelle Hausmannskost</h2>
        <p class="hero-description">
            Gemeinsam mit unserem Partner Metzgerei Pickartz bieten wir hochwertige Ernährungsberatung und traditionelle Hausmannskost.
        </p>
    </div>

    <!-- Content Section -->
    <div class="content-section">
        <!-- Main Content -->
        <div class="main-content">

                             alt="Daniel's Küche - Hausmannskost"

                        </div>
                    </div>

        <a href="/pages/kontakt-uns" class="cta-button">Ernährungsberatung anfragen</a>

<script>
    function toggleExpand(element) {
        // Solo su dispositivi mobili/tablet (sotto 1025px)
        if (window.innerWidth >= 1025) {
            return; // Non fare nulla su desktop
        }
        
        // Chiudi tutte le altre immagini espanse
        const allItems = document.querySelectorAll('.pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item');
        allItems.forEach(item => {
            if (item !== element) {
                item.classList.remove('expanded');
            }
        });
        
        // Toggle dell'elemento cliccato
        element.classList.toggle('expanded');
        
        // Scroll smooth verso l'immagine espansa
        if (element.classList.contains('expanded')) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                element.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'center'
                });
            }, 100);
        }
    }
    
    // Chiudi le immagini espanse quando si clicca fuori (solo mobile)
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        if (window.innerWidth >= 1025) {
            return; // Non fare nulla su desktop
        }
        
        const galleryItems = document.querySelectorAll('.pflegeteufel-page-wrapper .gallery-item');
        const clickedInsideGallery = event.target.closest('.gallery-item');
        
        if (!clickedInsideGallery) {
            galleryItems.forEach(item => {
                item.classList.remove('expanded');
            });
        }
    });
</script>
</div>
